name: Verify Remote File Download
description: This test case verifies the successful download of a file from a specified remote location.

steps.step: Identify the remote file URL and destination path.
steps.expectedResult: Remote URL and destination path are correctly identified.

steps.step: Initiate file download from the remote URL to the destination path using a suitable method (e.g., cURL, wget, API call).
steps.expectedResult: File download initiated successfully without errors.

steps.step: Verify the downloaded file exists at the destination path.
Verify the integrity of the downloaded file (e.g., checksum, file size comparison).
steps.testData: Compare MD5 checksum of downloaded file with expected checksum.
steps.expectedResult: Downloaded file's integrity matches the expected integrity.

steps.step: Clean up the downloaded file from the local system.
steps.expectedResult: Downloaded file is successfully removed from the local system.
